properties.name: value
properties.description: Binds to input and reflect current data. Could be initialize like null or undefined, but when value will contain data, the data type will be Array

properties.name: options
properties.description: Data for selecting. When checked option with `deselectAll=true` property, other options will be deselected. If after previous action select usual option, option with `deselectAll=true` will be discarded

properties.name: idMode
properties.description: Setup mode in which value of props will be equals the id from objects' options

properties.name: placeholder
properties.description: Show placeholder when value is empty

properties.name: displayTitle
properties.description: When props set up as true display only title in options

properties.name: emitFullOption
properties.description: Emit full option object when set up as true

properties.name: help
properties.description: Text for the tooltip at the bottom of the select

properties.name: optionsOverflow
properties.description: Set overflow for options list of the select

properties.name: showValidations
properties.description: Responsible for displaying validation of input

events.name: validation
events.description: Emitted when the multi select value changes and after component initialize
